text_block_list.text:
Y'all so loud! 
What's gotten into ya?
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, this opportunity to have fun 
only comes once a year! And so... 
We've prepared a cake just for you♪
text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey

text_block_list.text:
Wha?! Those kinda festivities ain't 
for me. I ain't a kid 'nymore, aight!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text:
Just wait until you've tried it! 
Rickey and I are really proud of 
the shortcake we made!
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
And a very fluffy caffè latte, too! 
We researched how to make one 
just for today♪
text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey

text_block_list.text:
What's more, a present! Falco and I 
looked through so many stores for 
the perfect gift♪
text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey

text_block_list.text:
Wha— Stop it! 
So much effort...!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text:
We settled on this amaaazing 
tail brush for you! 
Espo...
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
... Aaah, damn! 
I gotcha. We'll hang out, aight!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City
